attributes.action: TV Licence money must not be used to pay McAlpine compensation and legal costs.
attributes.additional_details: TV Licence money must not be used to pay McAlpine compensation and legal costs from his complaint against the BBC. Alternative method must be found to pay him not involving licence fee payers or tax payers. It would be a great injustice to the vast majority of the innocent British Public.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of Government. Therefore, this is a matter for the BBC and BBC Trust.
